translation.en: I would like you to know, the only reason I'm doin' this is 'cause folks think they know me.
translation.es: Quiero que sepan que solo hago esto porque la gente cree conocerme.

translation.en: They think they know what I'm about, and the truth is, they don't know me.
translation.es: Creen saber cómo soy, y lo cierto es que no me conocen.

translation.en: Anyhoo, if, in the end, this helps some other people out, then that's cool too.
translation.es: En fin, si esto termina ayudando a otras personas, está bien también.

translation.en: I consider myself abnormal.
But who wants to be like everybody else?
translation.es: Pero ¿quién quiere ser como el resto?

translation.en: Not I.
Some people call me a "freak."
And I hate that word.
I don't believe in it, or better yet, I don't believe in one-word labels.
translation.es: No creo en ella. No creo en etiquetas de una palabra.

translation.en: But... what you gonna do?
You feel me?
I love walking the beautiful and nitty-gritty streets of New York City.
translation.es: Adoro caminar por las hermosas y activas calles de Nueva York.

translation.en: But, sometimes, walking the beautiful, nitty-gritty streets as a woman can be, well...
translation.es: Pero, a veces, caminar por las hermosas y activas calles como mujer es...

translation.en: brutal.
Peep this bullshit.
Psst! Psst! Why don't you sit on my dick and peddle my balls? [laughs]
translation.es: ¿Te sientas en mi verga y pedaleas mis bolas?

translation.en: Excuse me, miss, but you so fine,
I'd drink a tub of your bath water out a champagne glass.
translation.es: que bebería el agua de su tina en una copa.

translation.en: You wanna know why? 'Cause your mom's placenta was filled with holy water.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Porque la placenta de su madre tenía agua bendita.

translation.en: God blessin' you, girl! Mm! Good God!
Cutie-ho, I bet you your farts smell like grape Jolly Ranchers,
translation.es: Belleza, tus gases deben oler a caramelos combinados

translation.en: Fruity Pebbles, and AriZona Iced Tea, all combined.
translation.es: con cereales y jugo de uva.

translation.en: Damn, what a combination!
Sista, I'll go gay for you.
translation.es: Hermana, me haré gay por ti.

translation.en: You got me questionin' my whole sexual preference.
translation.es: Me haces cuestionar mi preferencia sexual.

translation.en: Damn, you so perfect.
Baby girl, I just wanna play the drumroll to Phil Collins' song "In The Air Tonight"
translation.es: Bebé, quiero tocar el redoble de In The Air Tonight de Phil Collins

translation.en: on your right black butt cheek.
Hey, boo, where's your crown at? Stop frontin' like you're not a Nubian queen. Bang! Bang!
translation.es: Linda, ¿dónde está tu corona? No mientas, eres una reina nubia.

translation.en: Darling, you would be a terrific accessory to my impressive car collection.
translation.es: Serías un accesorio fantástico para mi increíble colección de autos.

translation.en: Do you see this watch? This is a platinum and gold Rolex.
translation.es: ¿Ves el reloj? Es un Rolex de platino y oro.

translation.en: You come with me, you'll have two and join me at the top.
translation.es: Ven y tendrás dos y estarás en lo alto.

translation.en: Hot thang,
you look so good, Jesus on the cross must be doin' your taxes.
translation.es: te ves tan bien que Jesús debe pagar tus impuestos.

translation.en: I truly believe that there is only one person,
translation.es: Realmente creo que solo hay una persona en el mundo que es tu alma gemela,

translation.en: only one in this world that is meant to be your soul mate, your lifelong companion.
translation.es: una persona en el mundo que es tu alma gemela, tu compañera de toda la vida.

translation.en: Joke is, rarely do these two people hook up.
translation.es: Pero estas dos personas no suelen encontrarse.

translation.en: They just... wander about aimlessly, lost in the sauce.
translation.es: Solo pasean sin dirección, perdidos en la confusión.

translation.en: You know, God is a trickster.
In life, God doesn't give you the people you want.
translation.es: No te da la gente que quieres,

translation.en: Instead, he gives you the people you need.
Nola Darling...
is my need.
-♪ Girl, I love the way you release me ♪ -Another great lunch.
How come we always make love in your bed?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre lo hacemos en tu cama?

translation.en: Now, you know I can only make love in my own lovin' bed.
translation.es: Sabes que solo puedo hacerlo en mi amada cama.

translation.en: Besides, we ain't doin' it in your bed.
translation.es: Además, no lo haremos en la tuya.

translation.en: So, does it possess... magical, mystical powers?
Now, I'm possessed.
You think so, huh?
Yo! "What about Nola Darling?" What do you wanna know?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay con Nola Darling? ¿Qué quieren saber?

translation.en: [scoffs] I think Nola's a freak.
You know? You know? You know.
Freaky-deaky, deaky-freaky, freaky to the deaky, deaky to the freaky.
translation.es: Friki de hacerlo, hacerlo como friki, la friki da, la friki recibe.

translation.en: Yo, check it. Most dudes want freaks.
translation.es: Escuchen. La mayoría de los tipos quieren frikis.

translation.en: I do. I do. Do I? I do!
-Okay. -All right, moment of truth, baby. Ooh!
translation.es: - Bien. - Momento de la verdad, cariño.

translation.en: -Damn. You okay if I put my bike here? -Yeah, it's fine.
translation.es: Rayos. - ¿Dejo mi bici aquí? - Está bien.

translation.en: Dag. It took you long enough to invite me in.
Dag, I don't just let anybody up in here.
translation.es: Rayos, no dejo entrar a cualquiera.

translation.en: -So, what, is "Mars" a nickname? -Nah, it's my government.
translation.es: - ¿Mars es un apodo? - No, mi nombre real.

translation.en: My mom, she named me Mars 'cause she said I'm outta this universe. A'ight?
translation.es: Mi madre me llamó así por Marte porque soy de otro planeta.

translation.en: [Mars] Dope.
-It's not finished. -Still dope.
-My born day is May 19th. -Happy early born day.
translation.es: - Nací el 19 de mayo. - Feliz precumpleaños.

translation.en: Mars, Malcolm X was born on May 19th too.
translation.es: Mars, Malcolm X nació el 19 de mayo también.

translation.en: No disrespect. Denzel did the damn thing.
translation.es: Va con respeto. Denzel lo hizo.

translation.en: -And got robbed of that Academy Award. -That was some shenanigans.
translation.es: - Le robaron ese Premio de la Academia. - Fue un chanchullo.

translation.en: Some subterfuge, straight skulduggery.
He was too black, too strong. Al Pacino, though? Come on.
translation.es: Era demasiado negro, demasiado fuerte. ¿Al Pacino? Vamos.

translation.en: Don't hate on Al Pacino. Scarface, that's my joint.
translation.es: No lo odies. Scarface es mi película.

translation.en: You know what a make-up call is in basketball?
Does Mars Blackmon know what a make-up call is in basketball?
translation.es: ¿Mars Blackmon sabe lo que es compensar?

translation.en: Is Barry "White"? Is Al "Green"?
translation.es: ¿Sé quién es Barry White, Al Green,

translation.en: Is James "Brown"? Is Prince "Purple"?
It was an Academy of Motion Pictures Arts and Sciences make-up call.
translation.es: Fue una compensación de la Academia de Artes y Ciencias.

translation.en: Pacino got fucked four times.
translation.es: A Pacino lo cagaron cuatro veces.

translation.en: He got fucked over for The Godfather and The Godfather Part II, Serpico,
translation.es: Lo cagaron con El Padrino y El Padrino II, Serpico,

translation.en: and fucked again big time for Dog Day Afternoon.
translation.es: y de nuevo con Tarde de perros.

translation.en: Damn, Sam.
So... they gave Pacino his long-overdue Oscar,
translation.es: Así que a Pacino le dieron su demorado Óscar,

translation.en: and then Denzel gets his make-up call Oscar for Training Day,
translation.es: y luego compensaron a Denzel con uno por Día de entrenamiento,

translation.en: which he should've won anyway, so the Academy still owes D another one.
translation.es: que debió ganar igual, y le siguen debiendo otro a D.

translation.en: And I know they better not fuck him over for Fences.
translation.es: Mejor que no lo caguen con Fences.

translation.en: Word to the mother. You know a lot about movies, huh?
translation.es: Totalmente de acuerdo. Sabes mucho de películas.

translation.en: -I'm a cinephile. -A cine-what?
A cinephile. A film enthusiast.
Well, you know, I wanna be a phile-cine wit' you.
-A what? Cinephile. -My bad. My bad.
Mars, you are cuckoo for Cocoa Puffs. You know that?
-Yo, this whole spot is yours? -Mm-hmm.
I likes. I likes.
What's the rent?
This is gentrified Fort Greene. You already know.
translation.es: Es el aburguesamiento de Fort Greene. Lo sabes.

translation.en: You need a roommate? Motherfucker, you smokin' K2?
translation.es: - ¿Necesitas un compañero? - Hijo de puta, ¿fumas K2?

translation.en: I let you up in here one time, and right away, you wanna move in?
translation.es: Vienes por primera vez, y ya te quieres mudar.

translation.en: -Seriously? -Eh--
How you... How you afford this joint?
Your family got it like that?
-No, my parents are artists. -So are mine.
translation.es: - No, mis padres son artistas. - Los míos también.

translation.en: -Really? -Well, yeah, my pops is an artist.
translation.es: - ¿En serio? - Mi papá es un artista.

translation.en: A con artist?
-[R&B music playing] -196... 197...
Go, Greer.
I'm the best thing that ever happened to Nola Darling.
translation.es: Soy lo mejor que le pasó a Nola Darling.

translation.en: Ask her. She'll tell you that herself. That woman worships me.
translation.es: Pregúntenle. Ella misma se lo dirá. Esa mujer me adora.

translation.en: What a pair. What a-- What a couple we make.
When we are together...
...it's on like hot buttered popcorn.
We are a dynamic duo.
A terrific twosome.
Legendary lovers.
I can keep going if you wish, if you...
...if you so desire.
-♪ When you are not with me ♪ -Ah, Michael Jackson spin! -♪ I had to leave, I have to live ♪ -[growling]
I got a lion in my pocket, and, baby, he is ready to roar.
translation.es: Tengo un león en mi bolsillo, y está listo para rugir, cariño.

translation.en: Was that the Cowardly Lion, or Snagglepuss even? Hm?
translation.es: ¿Ese fue el León Cobarde o Melquíades?

translation.en: Can't no other dudes hit it the way I'm 'bout to now.
translation.es: Ningún otro tipo puede hacerlo como yo lo haré.

translation.en: Greer, you're wallin'. Don't talk, okay?
-[Greer] Greer! -[Nola] What?
Do you realize you are gazing upon the bi-racial Adonis?
translation.es: ¿Te das cuenta de que estás contemplando al Adonis birracial?

translation.en: You know I'm fine as shit.
Greer, you are the epitome of narcissism. Don't you get tired of you?
translation.es: Greer, eres el arquetipo del narcisismo. ¿No te cansas de ti?

translation.en: Never happen. Ugh.
I bet you love yourself more than Kanye loves Kanye.
translation.es: Seguro te amas más que Kanye ama a Kanye.

translation.en: There's no crime in lovin' oneself.
translation.es: No es un delito amarse a uno mismo.

translation.en: In fact, that is the greatest love of all. I can sing it like Whitney, if you wish.
translation.es: De hecho, es el amor más grande de todos. Puedo cantarlo como Whitney si quieres.

translation.en: I don't wish.
Ha! Voilà!
WDF, Nola! What da fuck?
What? It's your ugly inner self, Greer.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Es tu horrible yo interior feo, Greer.

translation.en: I call it Sexy Beast.
-No! -All right, you know the deal.
translation.es: ¡No! Sabes cómo es. Debes irte. Tengo que empezar otra pieza.

translation.en: It's time to go. I got another piece to start.
translation.es: Sabes cómo es. Debes irte. Tengo que empezar otra pieza.

translation.en: Nola...
With the tongue...
[muttering] Posin' all this damn time for this bullshit.
translation.es: Posando todo este tiempo para esta mierda.

translation.en: It was almost good, Nola.
Bye, Greer.
Don't front, though.
Ain't no dudes ever put it down the way I did today.
translation.es: Ningún tipo lo hará como lo hice hoy.

translation.en: Nola and I used to be roommates, until we had a slight falling out.
translation.es: Nola y yo compartíamos departamento hasta que tuvimos una pequeña pelea.

translation.en: I can't lie, it was a big falling out.
We're still cool, still friends. We just can't live together.
translation.es: Seguimos siendo amigas, pero no podemos vivir juntas.

translation.en: And by the way, don't ask me anything about Mars Blackmon, ever.
translation.es: Por cierto, no me pregunten nada sobre Mars Blackmon, jamás.

translation.en: Off-limits.
I'd get up early in the morning, on my way to Jivamukti Vinyasa class,
translation.es: Me levanto temprano para ir a mi clase de Jivamukti Vinyasa

translation.en: and I'd run into all these randos in our bathroom.
translation.es: y me cruzo con extraños en nuestro baño.

translation.en: Nola!
Not okay. Nola and I talked about it, but, like she said...
translation.es: No está bien. Nola y yo lo hablamos, pero como dijo...

translation.en: I found this crib, and if you can't hang, maybe you should start looking
translation.es: Hallé este lugar y si no puedes tolerarlo, deberías buscar

translation.en: -for another place of residence. -Bye!
I said, "Bye," and I got my own brownstone apartment in Fort Greene.
translation.es: Dije adiós y me conseguí este departamento en Fort Greene.

translation.en: What could I do? Nola's name was on the lease. Regardless...
translation.es: ¿Qué podía hacer? Su nombre estaba en el contrato. Sin embargo...

translation.en: Nola is still my girl.
I'm carrying my entire portfolio on the C-train during rush hour.
translation.es: Llevo todos mis trabajos en el tren C, hora pico.

translation.en: And this dude bumps into me, like bam! Hard. I swear he did it on purpose.
translation.es: Un tipo me choca... fuerte. Creo que lo hizo adrede.

translation.en: Knocks all of my drawings on the nasty subway floor.
translation.es: Tira mis dibujos al piso sucio del subte.

translation.en: People were literally stepping on my fingers, pushing to get off the subway.
translation.es: La gente me pisaba los dedos, y empujaba para bajar del metro.

translation.en: I'm trying to pick up my shit. It's like I don't even exist.
translation.es: Yo intentaba levantar todo. Parecía invisible.

translation.en: -I would've lost it. -I get to my interview 15 minutes late.
translation.es: - Habría enloquecido. - Llegué tarde a la entrevista.

translation.en: I open up the portfolio. Footprints on all of my drawings.
translation.es: Abro la carpeta. Había pisadas en todos los dibujos.

translation.en: -[woman] No. -Oh, my God. What did you do?
-I had to show 'em as is, so I freestyled. -[chuckling]
I spit out everything I learned at Pratt Institute. I dug deep.
translation.es: Conté todo lo aprendido en el Instituto Pratt. Fui exhaustiva.

translation.en: By the end, I had them thinking the footprints
were like some dope Basquiat conceptual touch.
translation.es: eran como un toque conceptual estilo Basquiat.

translation.en: -I love that. -Ladies.
Thank you.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
-What is this? -The Fo-Gre cucumber martini.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es esto? - Martini de pepino Fo-Gre.

translation.en: This tastes like moonshine brewed in Bushwick.
Ma'am, it's what you ordered.
This is not Goose. I can taste the $3 difference.
translation.es: No es Goose. Reconozco la diferencia de $3.

translation.en: -Really? -Really.
-Clo-- -No.
Your beautiful beard and sense of entitlement do not intimidate me.
translation.es: Tu hermosa barba y actitud soberbia no me intimidan.

translation.en: -I'll be right back with your drink. -[Clo] Thank you.
translation.es: - Ya regreso con su trago. - Gracias.

translation.en: -Was all of that drama really necessary? -Absolutely. I'm standing my ground.
translation.es: - ¿Era necesario todo eso? - Absolutamente. Me mantengo firme.

translation.en: I'm not gonna cede the Fort to hipster imperialism.
translation.es: No cederé ante el imperialismo hípster.

translation.en: -By the way, what the fuck is a Fo-Gre? -Or NoHo, NoHa.
translation.es: - Por cierto, ¿qué rayos es un Fo-Gre? - O NoHo, NoHa.

translation.en: -SoBro, Bedwick. -Or the BoCoCa.
Translation: all acronyms for places we can no longer afford to live.
translation.es: Traducción: acrónimos de lugares que ya no podemos costear.

translation.en: Hello, $6.99 for a quart of milk from the Arab bodega in my hood?
translation.es: ¿$6,99 por un cuarto de leche de la tienda árabe?

translation.en: -They must be out their goddamn minds. -It is organic.
Nope, no dice.
-[woman] Okay. -I don't know what he put in my drink,
translation.es: No sé qué tiene, pero sabe bien.

translation.en: -but this shit tastes good. -Some people are not so particular.
translation.es: No sé qué tiene, pero sabe bien. Algunas personas no son tan exigentes.

translation.en: I hope this is to your liking.
-Much better. Thank you. -[Nola] Nice.
-Salud. -To Nola.
I'm very excited to see the beautiful things that you make
translation.es: Ansío ver las cosas hermosas que harás

translation.en: -and experience this next year. -I double that.
translation.es: - y experimentarás este próximo año. - Doblo eso.

translation.en: And here's to droppin' shit on the C-train and turnin' that shit into art.
translation.es: Por dejar caer cosas en el tren C y transformarlas en arte.

translation.en: To this, to my beautiful friends. To not succumbing to distractions.
translation.es: Por esto, mis hermosas amigas. Por no caer en distracciones.

translation.en: -Is that what we're calling them now? -Oh, see, no, no, no.
What we're not gonna do is discuss my sex life over born day cocktails.
translation.es: No hablaremos de mi vida sexual en un brindis de festejo.

translation.en: -Not gonna do that cliché. -Too bad.
translation.es: - No haré ese cliché. - Qué mal.

translation.en: And stop seeing everyone's success as my failure.
translation.es: No veré el éxito de todos como mi fracaso.

translation.en: I had this professor who always used to say
that just because you know how to hold a paintbrush,
that doesn't make you an artist.
It's the act of guiding that brush to places that no one's ever been
translation.es: Guiar ese pincel a lugares que nadie ha visto

translation.en: or wouldn't dare to go that defines you.
translation.es: o no se animarían a ir, eso te define.

translation.en: [woman] To Nola. Cheers!
Happy birthday.
Thank you.
I come... bearing gifts.
I see.
-What is all this? -I got you some art supplies.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es todo esto? - Te traje artículos artísticos.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness.
-Thank you. -Yeah, no problem.
What else you bring me?
Wouldn't you like to know.
[Jamie] Make a wish.
Perfect end to a perfect born day.
translation.es: Final perfecto para un día de cumpleaños perfecto.

translation.en: -You like? -Mm.
Yeah, this cake is on point.
-Happy birthday. -Mm.
Thank you for coming.
Excuse me.
Pronto!
-Yo! Nola, happy born day! -Thank you.
-You're welcome. Yo, it's me, Mars. -I know.
translation.es: - De nada. Habla Mars. - Lo sé.

translation.en: Come hither. Let's go for a romantical bike ride and shit.
translation.es: Oye, demos un paseo romántico en bici.

translation.en: That sounds dope, but I'm in for the night.
translation.es: Suena genial, pero voy a acostarme.

translation.en: In the bed? In the lovin' bed? With who the fuck--? Let's celebrate your born night.
translation.es: ¿Ya? ¿En la cama amadora? ¿Con quién? Celebremos tu cumpleaños.

translation.en: I could ride my custom-built-by-me bike over there in five minutes.
translation.es: Podría ir en mi bici construida por mí en cinco minutos.

translation.en: Young is the night, night is the young and shit.
translation.es: Vamos, que la noche es joven.

translation.en: I can't. It's too late. Call me in the morning. Good night!
translation.es: No puedo. Es muy tarde. Llama en la mañana. Buenas noches.

translation.en: -Sorry. -♪ Though she's only queen for a day ♪
Seriously?
-Wake up, wake up, wake up! -Yo, gimme the phone.
-Chill, my phone is dead. Nola. -Gimme my phone.
-What? -Nola.
-Nola. -What do you want?
-Nola, just let me smell it. -Ugh! You're disgusting.
Hit me off. Just a whiff.
You are so dumb!
Please, mami, please, mami, please, mami. [sniffs] Por favor.
Oh, my God. Quit cakin' on my damn phone. You one thirsty-ass half-nigga.
translation.es: Cielos. Deja de coquetear con mi teléfono, medio negro desesperado.

translation.en: -You a half-ass nigga too. -And half-Puerto Rican.
translation.es: - También eres media negra. - Y puertorriqueña.

translation.en: -Shut the fuck up. -"Shut the fuck up"?
No, not you, Nola! I'm tellin' my stupid-ass sister to shut the fuck up.
translation.es: ¡A ti no, Nola! Le digo a mi estúpida hermana.

translation.en: Yo, hold the fuck-- Is a dude there?
translation.es: Oye, espera... ¿Tienes un tipo ahí, en nuestra cama?

translation.en: -In our lovin' bed? -Uh-uh. Adios.
translation.es: Oye, espera... ¿Tienes un tipo ahí, en nuestra cama? Adiós.

translation.en: -You can't keep your hos in check? -Nola's not a ho.
translation.es: - ¿No controlas a tus perras? - Nola no es eso.

translation.en: -But Roxanne, on the other hand... -[scoffs]
She about to get it.
Oh, my goodness. [chuckles]
-Who was that? -A friend.
What kind of friend?
-A man friend. -We've discussed this.
translation.es: - Un amigo hombre. - Ya lo hablamos.

translation.en: You know what? Forget I mentioned it.
I wrote you a poem.
Instead of gettin' you a corny-ass Hallmark birthday card.
translation.es: En vez de traerte un tarjeta barata de Hallmark.

translation.en: Well, that was sweet of you.
As I said when I first met you, investment bankers can be poets too.
translation.es: Como dije cuanto te conocí, los banqueros podemos ser poetas también.

translation.en: Isn't that two different parts of the brain?
translation.es: ¿Eso no involucra a las dos partes del cerebro?

translation.en: Well, see, God, he held his hands on me a little longer.
translation.es: Dios me sostuvo más tiempo en sus manos.

translation.en: I bet.
"Your name leaves my lips the moment I wake from slumber.
translation.es: Tu nombre abandona mis labios en el momento que despierto.

translation.en: -I call out to you. Nola Darling!" -[chuckles]
"My anguished cry surfed the wild wind,
translation.es: Mi grito angustiado explora el viento salvaje

translation.en: through the black Brooklyn blocks, from Ocean Hill, Brownsville.
translation.es: por las calles negras de Brooklyn, de Ocean Hill, Brownsville.

translation.en: Never run, never will.
To Bed-Stuy, do or die.
translation.es: A Bed-Stuy, voy o no voy.

translation.en: In Fort Greene, don't be so mean.
translation.es: En Fort Greene, no tienes fin.

translation.en: They find their way to you, Nola Darling."
translation.es: Hallan el camino hacia ti, Nola Darling.

translation.en: Yo, that's the wackest shit I ever heard!
And what's wacker is that your fine ass fell for it. Damn, yo!
translation.es: Y lo peor es que caíste con ese poema. ¡Rayos!

translation.en: Nola, I don't mean to badmouth whoever wrote that ca-ca on a stick,
translation.es: Nola, no quiero hablar mal de quién escribió esa caca,

translation.en: but he ain't got game. Straight cornball.
His "poe-try" is not the answer. I'm the answer, like Iverson.
translation.es: Su intento de poesía no es la respuesta. Yo lo soy, como Iverson.

translation.en: I'm also a dope poet, and you ain't even know it-it-it-it-it.
translation.es: También soy un poeta genial, y ni siquiera lo sabes.

translation.en: I got mad skills.
Amongst my many multiple talents, I'm also a dope rapper.
translation.es: Entre mis muchos múltiples talentos, soy un rapero increíble.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Check this funky fresh joint.
-Uh, puff, puff, pass. -Got you.
♪ Some girls got beauty Some girls got grace ♪
translation.es: Algunas chicas tienen belleza, algunas chicas tienen gracia.

translation.en: ♪ But you so black perfect You win the goddamn motherfuckin' race ♪
translation.es: Pero tu color es tan perfecto, que ganas la maldita carrera.

translation.en: ♪ Yes, yes, yah! ♪
♪ Some freaks got style Some freaks got class ♪
translation.es: Algunos frikis tienen estilo, algunos frikis tienen clase.

translation.en: -♪ But Nola got that in the tight-- ♪ -Did you just call me a freak?
translation.es: - Pero Nola tiene eso en... - ¿Me llamaste friki?
